post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body: If you want a highly paid job then get off the unemployment benefit. But in regards to this mod, would someone be willing to do a few funny monster models for me? I would do it myself only it will break my heart. Thanks!

post.author: Marineofuac
post.body:
Quote:
If you want a highly paid job then get off the unemployment benefit.


LOL

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: well, job + unemployment = prison byatch.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body: I could really use some help reguarding the cacodemon. I want to turn him into a police helicopter. More or less keeping his original shape but with a rotor and NYPD textures. If anyone wants to help me it would be greatly appreciated

post.author: mavrik65
post.body: why would it break your heart if you modelled it? I like to do practically everything in my mod so I have complete creative control over the whole project. (and the credits will all be me! ) Changing the textures to NYPD shouldn't be hard just use gimp and use the existing cocodemon texture as a guide.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body: lol cocodemon. Yeah I'll give it a shot thanks...

post.author: TTK-Bandit
post.body:
I can't remember any monsters in Total Recall..
I guess this isn't a game based on the movie, right ? what is it then about ?

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
Here you go my dear fellow.
viewtopic.php?f=39&t=20985
The thing about the mod is I'm gonna try not to have too many hell type enemies. I would like to keep it quaid versus guards and so on but there will be some monsters used for mutants and one of them will be used for the taxi driver Benny!

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
I'd make a cocoa puffs demon if you want one



Otherwise, a helicopter cacodemon with NYPD texture would take about an hour to do, maybe less, if it's just a matter of adding the rotors and the texture.

post.author: bladeghost
post.body: Too funny, I had considered a doom jungle type mod in the jungle where the copter' drops you off at a campsite. but a cacodemon copter... hmmm I love it.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
Brain Trepaning wrote:
Otherwise, a helicopter cacodemon with NYPD texture would take about an hour to do, maybe less, if it's just a matter of adding the rotors and the texture.


If you could do that it would really help me out. And the proceeds would be going towards a worthy cause, your gaming pleasure

That's a damn minigun!

post.author: bladeghost
post.body:
Cacodemon with a beanie... oh my...
hope not...cmon guys.

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Douglas Quaid wrote:
If you could do that it would really help me out. And the proceeds would be going towards a worthy cause, your gaming pleasure


I wasn't offering my skillz with that project summary, I was simply letting you know how much time you will need to devote to it.

However, bladeghost's "hope not...cmon guys" comment has sort of altered my perspective about participating.

I was testing a helicopter monster for the opening sequence of the 2nd Doom 3 Lego mod called "Lego Riot". The idea was to blow it out of the sky and a bunch of Lego pieces would rain down.

http://www.trepaning.com/blt/030908-heli.avi 500k

post.author: mavrik65
post.body:
Brain Trepaning wrote:



please put a drivable lego motorbike in it. That would be so awesome.

- Cocodemon: full of chocolatey goodness

post.author: bladeghost
post.body:
What I meant was an organic mechanical type of copter for a cacodemon.
that looks menacing and scary . almost insectlike.. but what do I know...
